DOC.brief_title: To Evaluate Hormonal Response Low Blood Sugar After Single Oral Dose AZD1656 Suspension
DOC.criteria: Healthy male volunteer . Clinically normal physical finding ( incl . Electrocardiogram ( ECG ) ) laboratory value judge investigator . Have body mass index ( BMI ) ≥19 ≤30 Clinically significant illness clinically relevant trauma , judge investigator , within 2 week first administration investigational product Intake prescribe medicine OTC drug ( include herbal , vitamin mineral ) , except occasional paracetamol nasal spray nasal congestion , within two week first administration investigational product . Daily use nicotine contain substance .
